column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Hands down my favorite restaurant! I love the tapa style and we ordered all the popular dishes on the menu! The burrata
column2: octopus and paella were awesome and we loved the white sangria we well. The paella was very rich and creamy
column3: and the seafood tasted really fresh with a natural sweetness. Pork belly was very crispy and rich
column4: and the potatoes were out of this world! Would definitely recommend if you are looking for Spanish food and family style dining!
